entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hidden version files in .NET aspnetcore installation #44559
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #44556
  • In custom middleware, there are no route data values #44554
  • Publish .NET Core app with shared project with spaces in name. Misleading error message: net6.0\browser-wasm\ref or net6.0\win-x64\ref not found #44552
  • AuthZ: Add IRequirementData #44551
    8.0-preview1
  • Follow up on: UseEndpoints behaves differently in Development and Production env #44545
  • Weird Blazor WASM bug: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] Unhandled exception rendering component: Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException #44542
  • Link generation for actions in areas adds the area as an url parameter instead of as part of the path #44541
  • (Blazor) Navigating to a non-existing page does not call Dispose() on IDisposable component #44539
  • Json parsing error behaviors control in Minimal Api #44538
  • Kestrel: Support for multiple transports, side-by-side #44537
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add StringSyntax formats throughout source code #44535

Closed

  • coverlet.msbuild not working of .net 7 #44553
  • `[directory]` not shown in installation bundle help #44167
  • Fine-grained override of `OAuthHandler.HandleRemoteAuthenticateAsync` #44424
  • Assumption about relative path for project files #44224
  • blazor-hotreload.js breaks offline service worker when running from visual studio. #44487
  • UseEndpoints behaves differently in Development and Production env #44491
  • 'dotnet publish' does not publish wwwroot when Blazor project is a dependency #44519
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rtm.22510.17] Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Converting circular structure to JSON when opening a new tab #44521
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #44517

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
  • Fix documentation for .AddIdentityResources() #44560
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Remove temporary allocations from Identity #44557
    Perf, area-identity
  • Add CompositeFormat StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #44555
    community-contribution
  • Override Send in TestHost.ClientHandler #44550
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Feature/inform when disabling http2 #44543
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • add ppc64le arch to crossgen2 not available list #44536
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Increase timeouts for template tests #44558
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Increase timeouts for template tests #44549
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2021196 #43956
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix request delegate analyzer error on null return type #44534
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security, blog-candidate
  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Skip template update check in template tests #44532
    area-mvc
